Content.Data:
==Definitions==
* Library
* Folder
* View
* Article
==FAQ== * What is an "Attack" article?
This is an article that describes what an attack is, how it is carried out, and often provides an example of an attack. This is the most basic type of guidance in TEAM Mentor. You will frequently find links to more advanced (and related) articles at the bottom of an Attack article.
* How is it different from a "Guideline"?
*What is a "Checklist" article? etc.
